other_title: デジモンアドベンチャー (Japanese)
plot: Seven kids are transported to the Digital World, a strange place where digital creatures called "Digimon" reside. A group of Digimon soon befriend them and keep the kids out of harm's way. The children then become the Digidestined, or Chosen Children, which protect the Digital World from evil Digimon like Devilmon and Myotismon.
vintage: 2000-07-03 (Brazil - Globo TV and Fox Kids, simultaneously)
insert_song: "Brave Heart (Evolution Theme Song)" by Ayumi Miyazaki
"Yuuki wo Tsubasa ni Shite" by Toshiko Fujita
